ActSpecial Appointment Regulations, No. 2003-16
PrecisAppointment of BERNARD GRENIER of Montréal, Quebec, to be Special Advisor to the Minister of Justice, Criminal Conviction Review Group, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis.
